mainTitleENG: Let’s get acquainted with migration cloud services!
paragraph1ENG: Long story short, we provide a service for transferring your data from the enterprise server to our cloud environment. It’s the example of infrastructure as a service application migration or IaaS migration.
paragraph2ENG: In other words, we transfer your business applications and data to secure server and help you concentrate only on business processes with no headache about data storage and security.
